about: I am currently in the 2nd semester of my MSc. Computer Science at the Technical University of Denmark. As an ambitious guy, I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities, and I approach problems with curiosity and a desire to learn.

I have a strong foundation when it comes to computer systems and possess great skills within algorithms and data structures, which I have taught at university-level. This enables me to tackle complex problems and design and implement efficient solutions.
In my free time, I love to enjoy a beer with my friends, have a few games of chess, and relax with a book --- at the moment I find investing books particularly interesting.

education.title: MSc. Computer Science in Engineering
education.description: I am currently pursuing my Master's degree in Computer Science and Engineering. The program provides an extensive work with algorithmic courses and advanced theortical concepts, computer science modelling, and software engineering. This program enables my to pursue and master other areas within Computer Science in the future.

education.title: BSc. Software Technology
education.description: I started on my bachelor's within Software Engineering in 2020, and fell in love with it instantly. This degree challenged my logical thinking and problem solving skills and allowed me to become a more well rounded engineer. I had a focus on algorithmics and wrote multiple projects on graph theory, which has been one of my largest academic interests.

education.title: HTX - Mathematics and IT
education.description: I spent 3 years completing my danish HTX degree in Mathematics and IT. This degree is where I really found my passion within Software Engineering and where i laid my analytical and technical foundation.

experience.title: Teaching Assistant: Algorithms and Datastructures I
experience.description: Answering academic questions, presenting course material and grading assignments.

experience.title: Teaching Assistant: Algorithms and Datastructures I
experience.description: Answering academic questions, presenting course material and grading assignments.

experience.title: Technical consultant and support
experience.description: Debug, optimize and update websites. Work with databases, file hosting, mailsystems and DNS. Development of smaller projects for internal use, e.g. websites, chrome extensions and scripts.

experience.title: Teaching Assistant: Introductory Programming
experience.description: Answering academic questions, presenting course material and grading assignments.

projects.title: Bachelor's Thesis: Top Trees
projects.excerpt: In our bachelor's thesis we implemented and tested different dynamic graph algorithms, implemented upon the complex data structure splay top trees with the main challenge being an efficient dynamic bridge-finding algorithm.
projects.description: In our bachelor's thesis we implemented and tested different dynamic graph algorithms, implemented upon the complex data structure splay top trees with the main challenge being an efficient dynamic bridge-finding algorithm.

projects.title: Wordle
projects.excerpt: In this React Wordle project I utilized React to easily and efficiently design a responsive application, which provides an intuitive and enjoyable experience.
projects.description: In this React Wordle project I utilized React to easily and efficiently design a responsive application, which provides an intuitive and enjoyable experience.

projects.title: Regex Crossword Solver
projects.excerpt: This project is a regex solver crossword, which utilizes parsing and lexing of regex-strings. The solver generates and processes an AST to compute a set of restrictions which can be solved using Z3.
projects.description: This project is a regex solver crossword, which utilizes parsing and lexing of regex-strings. The solver generates and processes an AST to compute a set of restrictions which can be solved using Z3.

projects.title: Boids
projects.excerpt: This projects is a Boids simulation in JavaScript using p5.js, emphasizing visual appeal and showcasing complex flocking behavior through simple mathematical rules.
projects.description: This projects is a Boids simulation in JavaScript using p5.js, emphasizing visual appeal and showcasing complex flocking behavior through simple mathematical rules.

projects.title: Sorting Visualizer
projects.excerpt: In this Sorting Algorithm Project, I utilized React to create a visually appealing and intuitive way of visualizing sorting algorithms.
projects.description: In this Sorting Algorithm Project, I utilized React to create a visually appealing and intuitive way of visualizing sorting algorithms.

projects_deak.title: Chess AI
projects_deak.excerpt: A Chess AI written in C++ using SDL2 for a graphical user interface. This project showcases advanced algorithms and efficient board evaluation techniques.
projects_deak.description: A Chess AI written in C++ using SDL2 for a graphical user interface. This project showcases advanced algorithms and efficient board evaluation techniques.
